content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Copper Cable Factory at (2.5, 17.5)
Consists of the following entities:
• Cable Factory Input Chest at (2.5, 17.5)
• Factory Burner Inserter at (3.5, 17.5)
• Auxiliary Burner Inserter at (2.5, 16.5)
• Assembling Machine (assembling-machine-1) at (1.5, 19.5)
Use-case: This structure interfaces raw copper inputs with assembly operations to produce copper cable.

### Belt Depot at (3.5, 15.5)
Consists of the following entities:
• Belt Depot Wooden Chest at (3.5, 15.5) serving as the depot for received items
• Adjacent Transport Belt Segment at (4.5, 15.5)
• Depot Burner Inserter at (3.5, 14.5)
Use-case: This isolated belt depot is designed to receive items via multi‐segment transport belts from the extraction system and feed them into subsequent processes.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Transport Belt Connection Errors  
 – When connecting transport belts, verify that the target is a valid inserter rather than a Prototype.SteamEngine object. Use an inserter that feeds items into the intended machine to establish proper connections.

• Entity Placement Challenges  
 – Ensure the player is within the maximum allowable distance from the target position before placing an entity.  
 – Confirm the required inventory item is available prior to placement to avoid shortages.  
 – Define and reference variables correctly (for example, ensure that a target chest variable is properly defined) to prevent NameError issues.
